law.text:
Before a State agency issues a license or permit to an employer to engage in an activity in which the employer may employ a covered employee, as defined in § 9-101 of the Labor and Employment Article, the employer shall file with the State agency:
a certificate of compliance with the Maryland Workers' Compensation Act; or
the number of a workers' compensation insurance policy or binder.
